name: Test 42 (Test Build)
description:
This is a game about escaping. You are a Test Subject for a facility that wants to make human kind more powerful and dagerous by taking the extraordinary and stripping down what makes them better by any means. A seperate company that are working against the facility have broken in and are releasing the subjects and killing the staff. You need to escape before the facility falls and before the other subjects kill you. A mysterious person only know as the "Psychopath" is helping you get through the facility by using the PA system to talk to you and the cameras to see you.

This is a work in progress so please fill out this form to help me make this game better.

https://forms.gle/7oz3FZQhvD1FzNQ2A
